text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO No, he's fully justified, as they have betrayed the entire world and enabled the virus to spread to 189 countries by cooperating with China in hiding the facts and failing to report how contagious COVID-19 is! We contribute 10X's what China contributes and the WHO betrayed us!
